title: Christ's ascension into heaven asserted and practically improved in several sermons / by Joseph Hallet ... whereunto is added by way of preface some account of the pious author.
author: Hallet, Joseph, 1628?-1689.
publisher: Printed for John Salusbury and Robert Osborne ...,
notes: Epistle dedicatory reads : "But to the author of these ensuing sermons, my endeared father ..." ; epistle dedicatory signed: Joseph Hallet. F[ilius?]
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
